Package com.mongodb.starter.repositories

Class MongoDBPokemonRepository

java.lang.Object
com.mongodb.starter.repositories.MongoDBPokemonRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
PokemonRepository
public class MongoDBPokemonRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements PokemonRepository
Class that implements PokemonRepository Interface to allow PokemonController to perform CRUD operations in the database
